title: FONTfitter by Club Type
content: Has anyone put [FONTfitter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108202750/http:/www.clubtype.co.uk/software.html) to use? It's an app by [Club Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108202750/http:/www.clubtype.co.uk/)'s Adrian Williams that claims to "create letterspacing accurately, quickly and easily for professionally spaced fonts in minutes... saving up to 10 hours or more!"
author: Stephen Coles
